mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shall_profit_detail (merchant_id, order_no, channel_type, total_fee, wait_shall_amount, wait_shall_origin_amount, profit_type, channel_cost, channel_shall_amount, product_shall_amount, first_dealer_id, first_dealer_shall_amount, second_dealer_id, second_dealer_shall_amount, first_merchant_id, first_merchant_shall_amount, second_merchant_id, second_merchant_shall_amount, profit_date, status )VALUES( #{merchantId}, #{orderNo}, #{channelType}, #{totalFee}, #{waitShallAmount}, #{waitShallOriginAmount}, #{profitType}, #{channelCost}, #{channelShallAmount}, #{productShallAmount}, #{firstDealerId}, #{firstDealerShallAmount}, #{secondDealerId}, #{secondDealerShallAmount}, #{firstMerchantId}, #{firstMerchantShallAmount}, #{secondMerchantId}, #{secondMerchantShallAmount}, #{profitDate}, #{status} )
